name: X
description: x-axis spatial coordinate within the Montesinho park map: 1 to 9

name: Y
description: y-axis spatial coordinate within the Montesinho park map: 2 to 9

name: FFMC
description: FFMC index from the FWI system: 18.7 to 96.20

name: DMC
description: DMC index from the FWI system: 1.1 to 291.3

name: DC
description: DC index from the FWI system: 7.9 to 860.6

name: ISI
description: ISI index from the FWI system: 0.0 to 56.10

name: area
description: the burned area of the forest (in ha): 0.00 to 1090.84. The predictor is very skewed towards 0. Might be a good idea to model it with ln(x)
